message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.
I'm interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I understand that $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000, which is my minimum price, or $1350000, which is a compromise between our previous offers.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product.

I'm willing to meet you at $1100000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal, such as a complimentary service package worth $50000. I'll sell the product to you for $1100000, but I'll also include this service package for free. However, if you're not interested, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000, which is my minimum price.
I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product and the service package.

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000, which is the same price I offered in round 5, but without the service package. This is my best price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not interested, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000, which is my minimum price.
I understand that you're getting concerned, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1070000 for the product

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1150000, which is the highest price I've offered so far. If you're not interested, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000, which is my minimum price. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product, and this is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $800000.
